architectureStyle.description: Elegant but intimidating - classical Roman/Imperial aesthetic with hidden depths and surveillance
keyElements: Classical columns and grand facades hiding advanced technology
Green marble and polished dark stone
Bird of prey motifs in architecture - wings, talons, predatory shapes
Hidden rooms, secret passages, surveillance systems everywhere
Grand entrances designed to impress and intimidate visitors
Romulan Star Empire eagle emblems prominently displayed
Symmetrical, imposing designs suggesting order and power
Cloaking device aesthetic - things are not what they seem
Senate chamber style - tiered, dramatic, theatrical
NO bright colors, NO transparency - secrets are kept
architectureStyle.colors: Deep green marble, dark gray stone, bronze/copper accents, silver trim, emerald lighting
architectureStyle.materials: Polished stone, marble columns, bronze statues, concealed sensor grids

buildings.name: Senate Chamber
buildings.description: Where the Romulan Senate meets. Tiered seating, dramatic central podium, eagle emblems, imposing columns.

buildings.name: Tal Shiar Headquarters
buildings.description: Secret police command center. Appears normal outside, hidden interrogation chambers and surveillance within.

buildings.name: Praetor's Palace
buildings.description: Residence and office of the Praetor. Grand, imposing, heavily guarded, symbol of absolute power.

buildings.name: Imperial War College
buildings.description: Officer training academy. Classical architecture, tactical simulation chambers, graduation arena.

buildings.name: Cloaking Research Facility
buildings.description: Where cloaking technology is developed. Nondescript exterior hiding advanced laboratories.

buildings.name: Subspace Monitoring Station
buildings.description: Intelligence gathering facility. Massive sensor arrays, data analysis centers, always watching.

buildings.name: Reunification Underground
buildings.description: Hidden meeting place for Vulcan-Romulan reunification supporters. Concealed entrance, secret chambers.

buildings.name: Military Command
buildings.description: Fleet coordination center. Tactical displays, communication arrays, war room.

buildings.name: Singularity Power Plant
buildings.description: Artificial quantum singularity power generation. Unique Romulan technology, heavily shielded.

buildings.name: Shipyard Administration
buildings.description: Oversees warbird construction. Offices overlooking classified construction facilities.

buildings.name: Detention Facility
buildings.description: Political prison. Clean exterior, harsh conditions within. Interrogation and re-education.

buildings.name: Embassy
buildings.description: Diplomatic facility filled with hidden surveillance. Every room monitored, every conversation recorded.

buildings.name: Archaeological Institute
buildings.description: Studies ancient Vulcan/Romulan artifacts. Also covers for intelligence gathering.

buildings.name: Medical Research Center
buildings.description: Advanced medical facility. Also conducts classified biological research.

buildings.name: Communications Hub
buildings.description: Subspace relay station. Intercepts as much as it transmits.

buildings.name: Trade Bureau
buildings.description: Controls commerce. Every transaction monitored for intelligence value.

buildings.name: Noble House Estate
buildings.description: Senator's residence. Grand, classical, filled with political intrigue.

buildings.name: Temple of State
buildings.description: Quasi-religious site promoting loyalty to the Empire. Propaganda center.

buildings.name: Weapons Development
buildings.description: Plasma torpedo and disruptor research. High security, classified projects.

buildings.name: Population Registry
buildings.description: Tracks all citizens. Central database, identification systems, movement monitoring.

buildings.name: Agricultural Management
buildings.description: Controls food production. Efficiency over aesthetics, state controlled.

buildings.name: Defense Battery
buildings.description: Planetary defense weapons. Plasma torpedo launchers, disruptor arrays, cloaked until activated.

buildings.name: Mining Administration
buildings.description: Oversees resource extraction. Often using Reman labor.

buildings.name: Cultural Center
buildings.description: Promotes Romulan culture and superiority. Art, music, propaganda.
